# loops

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the audio source should play repeatedly.

## Declaration

```swift
var loops: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], audio players using this source automatically begin playing again after playback has finished. If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), the audio source plays exactly once.

## Setting Default Playback Parameters

- **volume**: The default playback volume for the audio source.
- **rate**: The default playback rate for the audio source.
- **reverbBlend**: The default blend of blend of unmodified and reverb-processed (also called dry and wet) audio for playback of the audio source.
- **shouldStream**: A Boolean value that determines whether the audio source should stream content from its source URL when playing.
